extendedInfo.description: Have fun storming the castle in the endless climber Leaping Legend! Leaping Legend is a fast-paced arcade styled endless climber where your goal is to reach for glory by climbing, leaping, and surviving for as long as possible! Dodge obstacles like a champion or die trying. The choice is yours! Encounter not-so-unfamiliar heroes and enemies, avoid taking arrows to the knee, and prove that YOLO is a myth! *Zombie free zone here!*FEATURES: - Endless Entertainment! Compete for the highest score against friends and foe alike with the global leaderboards, complete missions and quests to earn rewards for loot, and unlock a barrel full of achievements! - Tons of unlockable heroes! Are you the chivalrous Knight destined to save the damsel in distress? The elusive Ninja proving his skill? The illustrious Ace of Blades out for one more quest? Time to find out. - Challenging Gameplay! The challenge you face will get harder the further you go! Do you have what it takes to make it to the top and surviving the bombardment of cannons, the explosions of falling bombs, the piercing thrust of arrows, and much, much more?! - Share your success with your friends through SnapChat, Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter!- Hilarious pop-culture references from Game of Thrones, Breaking Bad, Walking Dead, Mario, Zelda, Big Bang Theory, Angry Birds, Star Wars, and more! - Free To Play! Leaping Legend is currently Free To Play so you can experience a world of not-so epic proportions! Clash of Clans, Candy Crush Saga, Minecraft, Dragonvale, and Poker all let you download for free, but none are as generous as Leaping Legend!Everplay Interactive is a new company to take on the free to play market that is dominated by the likes of Zynga, Electronic Arts, Kabam, Nimblebit, and Supercell!*REVIEWS*Leaping Legend has received fantastic reviews from PocketGamer, TouchArcade, SlideToPlay, 148Apps, Kotaku, IGN, and more!"Leaping Legend is a great one-minute time killer like Pocket God and Plants Vs Zombies.""The mobile devices have replaced xbox, playstation, and PC as the #1 gaming platform and free games like Leaping Legend show why." You can find us with the following keywords:castle, knights, lords, dragons, kingdoms, tap, warfare, monsters, tribe, paradise, shipwreck, islands, defense, pocket, boys, kids, fantasy, dressup, vikings, gladiator, tribes, sky,empire, story, swords, treasure, building, village, mystery,ville, towers.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great Game, could use stat upgrades so maybe 50 coins for 1 point in any category? Just an idea. Also, I had a bug where the help book from before you start a run was on the screen while I was playing, so I would accidentally push it while trying to switch sides, because it was directly above the button.
reviews.author: Luke L

reviews.title: still need a lot of update
reviews.comment: got a number of errors like how to quit? no quit button, after start we can only play and the only way to quit is to force close from task manager. and after we click the book with ? sign, its gonna stuck in there.
reviews.author: Daniel Christian

reviews.title: You have balls
reviews.comment: Its no secret that chain is Link. Its funny that when you select him the princess turns to Navi and she\'s says HEY LISTEN and it looks like he is going to kill her.
reviews.author: Christopher Cavalieri

reviews.title: Awesome fun
reviews.comment: Always been a fan of retro looking games, and this is one great! The wall running seems weird at first but learning to use it in combination with the jump in crucial at the higher reaches of the game.
reviews.author: Ariel Benavidez

reviews.title: I can\'t stop playing!
reviews.comment: This is the best game I\'ve played in a long time.  I would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.author: Dominic Ficarrotta

reviews.title: Pretty Fun!
reviews.comment: Pretty interesting and fun/fast-paced game! Frustrating at times because it seems like the game gets harder after you choose to revive yourself. Also, its pretty cool that you can watch a short 10 sec video for like 100 free coins. I\'d give it a 7/10 overall.
reviews.author: David Sanchez

reviews.title: Great Game, Excellent Developer!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always wanted a really decent vertical leaper/runner game, and this one not only brings retro graphics with it, but also the amazingly simple addition of being able to move up and down on the wall that makes all the difference in the world.  A great game with a great built in way to earn coins that is as non-intrusive as possible.  That and I mentioned on another websites forum that I would like to see a Shopkeeper one-liner disable button... and this update brings it!  I\'m totally taking credit for that.
reviews.author: Danger Dan Robinson

reviews.title: Some issues
reviews.comment: Numbers don\'t always show and I can\'t read what the people are saying or how much each character costs, other wise a good game
reviews.author: Danec Wetrich

reviews.comment: I love this game way to much and the music isn\'t irritating to the ears
reviews.author: Brian Igneal

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: Number of coins- I always see only the first digit.  implement help or better tutorial about things that can pop up while we are playing
reviews.author: Igor Dostanic

reviews.comment: it\'s cool but it\'s really log
reviews.author: john louie louie

reviews.title: Devs....
reviews.comment: These devs are epic..no words awesome retro fun. Good fun game.
reviews.author: Rohit Bhatia

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Fun game, but makes me rage really hard lol
reviews.author: Bob Marley

reviews.title: Really need to play this
reviews.comment: Leaping Legend awesomeness! Can\'t get enough of this.
reviews.author: Tyshawn Jackson

reviews.title: B.A.G
reviews.comment: This is a badass game I love Retro games

reviews.title: Pretty awesome
reviews.comment: The classic graphics make it really easy on the eyes
